divs: Sighting DetailsWas walking outside house at around 10pm, looked up to the northeast and saw smoke trail of a normal commercial jet plane, saw a triangle shaped object that I initially thought was a plane, had 5-6 exterior flashing lights like a plane with 2 of them in the middle flashing back and forth. Object was moving too slow to be a plane or helicopter like 10-20mph it seemed like heading in the SE direction towards the Atlantic Ocean. Two things that seemed irregular, speed of object and the lights. Object slowly flew away out of sight to the horizon.
Summary: saw it flying over house looked like a plane but was going too slow
